item.description:
This event looks like it is going to be a lot of fun. Done by the same group that did the Mob Father dinner, this should be just as much fun. It is a very interactive type of dinner theater that has everyone laughing. They are offering our group a discount price of $38. There will be envelopes on the table to tip the actors who are also the wait staff during the event.

All rsvps for this event are waiting list. You have to call the box office (781-780-3858) to reserve a seat and select an entree. The web site will not work for reservations. You need to use the code: NERD FUN GHOSTBASHERS to get the discount and be seated at one of the nerd fun tables. Once you have paid to reserve a seat, let me know and I will change your rsvp to yes.

For more details, including the menu, check out the link:

http://www.mysterycaf...

I will be outside the restaurant at 5, we will probably want to head inside around 5:15, dinner starts at 5:30. Show will run till about 8PM.

I thought it might be nice to go out for drinks after the show, if you have suggestions for a good place for the nerds to descend upon after, please let me know.

They are holding 25 seats for us. They have to release the seats to the general public by October 16th, so please call them before then to reserve a seat. Please rsvp to waiting list that you have reserved your seat, and I will move you to the yes list.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside the restaurant with a meetup sign
item.name: Ghost Bashers
